item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: print("I am writing this in python except through R Studio!") ## I am writing this in python except through R Studio! x="stringInPython" x[0] ## 's' Including Plots You can also embed plots.
